Classes/Crypto.html#/s:3RSA6CryptoC13gen.name: generatePrime(_:)
Classes/Crypto.html#/s:3RSA6CryptoC13gen.abstract: This methods generates a prime number with the designated width.

Classes/Crypto.html#/s:3RSA6CryptoC7encr.name: encrypt(_:key:)
Classes/Crypto.html#/s:3RSA6CryptoC7encr.abstract: This method encrypts a message using the RToLBinary exponentiation. If the message needs to be encrypted the public key should be passed, if the message should be decrypted the private key should be passed.

Classes/Crypto.html#/s:3RSA6CryptoC11mod.name: modularExpo(base:exponent:modulus:)
Classes/Crypto.html#/s:3RSA6CryptoC11mod.abstract: The memory efficient version of the modular exponentiation. Not very fast but very efficient on memory.

Classes/Crypto.html#/s:3RSA6CryptoC25mod.name: modularExponentRToLBinary(base:exponent:modulus:)
Classes/Crypto.html#/s:3RSA6CryptoC25mod.abstract: The more time efficient version of modular exponentiation.

Classes/Crypto.html.name: Crypto
Classes/Crypto.html.abstract: This class manages all the cryptographic stuff in the app.
